description: Mobile techniques used by SpyNote RAT, ATT&CK software S0305 v1.2
name: SpyNote RAT (S0305)

techniques.comment: [SpyNote RAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0305) uses an Android broadcast receiver to automatically start when the device boots.(Citation: Zscaler-SpyNote)
[SpyNote RAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0305) can activate the victim's microphone.(Citation: Zscaler-SpyNote)
[SpyNote RAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0305) can copy files from the device to the C2 server.(Citation: Zscaler-SpyNote)
